response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～呪いの記憶～
response.overview: The series has collaborated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news websites, and has now exceeded 80 titles in total, making it the gold standard of documentary horror! This time, the footage focuses on strange reflections that seem to be curses. Please watch the shocking footage of curses that inhabit objects and places, and the regretful images of those who lost their lives there, as if they were possessed.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Curse of Memories
